data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Torsten Dikow, Jason G. H. Londt (2000): A review of the genera Anasillomos Londt, 1983, Oratostylum Ricardo, 1925, and Remotomyia Londt, 1983, with description of a new genus and two new species (Diptera: Asilidae: Stenopogoninae). Ann. Natal Mus. 41: 107-121, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.11581
